column4: hi there.. I just tried to hard link /dev/dsp to /dev/adsp... prolly this was stupid, anyways, to get oss back on, where should I link dsp? (tried every files in /dev/snd/)
(in other words, how do I recreate /dev/dsp ? ;)
why not run alsa and use aoss
I tried to use aoss but it appears to give me very bad sampling quality
